title: Everything you need to know about Mets' 5-2 loss to Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 2 of NLDS
text: Everything you need to know about Mets' 5-2 loss to Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 2 of NLDS By Maria Guardado 2 hours 30 minutes ago Font size: The Los Angeles Dodgers defeated the Mets, 5-2, in Game 2 of the NLDS on Saturday night at Dodger Stadium, evening the best-of-five series to one game apiece. It wasn't the Mets' only loss of the night -- starting shortstop Ruben Tejada suffered a broken right fibula after Dodgers second baseman Chase Utley barreled into himâ€¦
